thread.title: Luck limited at practice, uncertain for game at Houston
thread.title_full: Luck limited at practice, uncertain for game at Houston

title: Luck limited at practice, uncertain for game at Houston
text:
Luck takes few snaps at practice amid questions about availability for Houston game By MICHAEL MAROT AP Sports Writer  11  12   
People: 

INDIANAPOLIS — Andrew Luck did some light work during the media portion of Monday's practice. 
He tossed a few very short screen passes and handed off a few times. Whether he'll do much more — or any more — Thursday night at Houston is still unclear. 
Luck did not speak with reporters after Sunday's 16-13 overtime victory, which he sat out because of an injured right shoulder, or before practice Monday. He is expected to take questions Tuesday. 
Matt Hasselbeck replaced Luck on Sunday, was 30 of 47 with 282 yards and one touchdown, and would likely start again Thursday if Luck can't play. 
Indy (2-2) also released third-string quarterback Josh Johnson on Monday and re-signed cornerback Shaun Prater to the active roster.
